summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015. It details various debits and credits, including payroll fees, health premiums, and other transactions, culminating in an ending balance. The document emphasizes the importance of reporting errors in account statements promptly.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account transactions for December 2015, showing various debits and credits.
The ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2015, is $40,491.78.
Multiple preauthorized debits are listed, including payments to ADP for payroll fees and health premiums.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements within specified timeframes.
There are no overdraft fees reported for the calendar year.
